About me

Since I could remember I have always loved working with software (from making games on Scratch to building my own websites). This started me down the path of wanting to become a developer and I have not stopped since. I believe complex problems can be solved with simple solutions and I love building those solutions. After starting my career in tech nearly a decade ago I have worked in a variety of roles from testing to development. I have worked with a variety of technologies and I am always looking for a new challenge to take on.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me hiking, playing music, or simply exploring new places. Whatever I decide to do I always love having a nice cup of coffee to start my day!

Check me out on LinkedIn

Projects

Account Balance Masker

This Chrome extension is designed to enhance privacy for users by masking their account balances when accessing banking websites. By concealing exact amounts, users can feel safer when browsing in public spaces or sharing their screen, reducing the risk of unsolicited attention.

See Live Source Code Blog Post
